Name: Saturn 'Martini'
Instructions: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. STIR honey with vodka and grapes to dissolve honey. Add wine, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Delicate, beautifully balanced and subtly flavoured.
History: Created in 2001 by Tony Conigliaro at Isola, Knightsbridge, London, England.
